references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(0) = 0, a(n) = 10*a(n/7) if n==0 (mod 7), a(n) = a(n-1)+1 otherwise. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Dec 22 2002
maple: A007093 := proc(n) local l: if(n=0)then return 0: fi: l:=convert(n,base,7): return op(convert(l,base,10,10^nops(l))): end: seq(A007093(n),n=0..63); # _Nathaniel Johnston_, May 06 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
